EXTRACTED VALUE: Not a complete disaster but still a long way short of fun. It's just...okay. [July 2008, p.80]
Eragon isnâ€™t a bad game per se but is ultimately an average affair as it offers very little innovation to hack and slash gaming.
Tells a formulaic story atop repetitive gameplay and is troubled by frequent technical problems.
A simplistic shooter that is charming precisely for its simplicity.
It's still fun to play, especially when you play online. Overall, though, this Tour will leave you less than thrilled.
